name: Grab and Catapult
description:
A game made in 1 day (3 hours to be exact) for the Weekly Game Jam 172! Theme was catapult and since the word catapult can also mean "an object thrown with a high velocity" I decided to make a game where the main character fights off red triangles using "yeetable objects" on the playing field.

WASD - Move Around

E - Collect "Yeetable Objects"

LMB - Shoot "Yeetable Objects"
